definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: No one’s ever looked at the brain waves before with human-animal interaction.
sentences.chinese: 以前從沒有人就人與動物的互動來觀察人類的腦電波。

sentences.english: Through CDs and audiotapes, brainwave technology will make use of tools that will help condition your brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 通過CD和錄音帶，腦電波科技會調製你的腦電波。

sentences.english: Through CDs and audiotapes, brainwave technology will make use of tools that will help condition your brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 通過CD和錄音帶，腦電波科技會調製你的腦電波。

sentences.english: The lower your stage of sleep, slower your brain waves will be.
sentences.chinese: 越進入後面的睡眠期，你的腦電波頻率將越慢。

sentences.english: In theory, you'd see a lot more brain-wave peaks per second as they pack this message into your head.
sentences.chinese: 理論上，每秒鐘你應該會看到更多的腦電波峯值點。

definition: to confuse one thing with another (idiom); to muddle
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
